Package gov.nasa.larcfm.Util

Class Vect2

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.larcfm.Util.Vect2
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Horizontal, TangentLine
    public class Vect2
extends java.lang.Object

    2-Dimensional mathematical vectors. Vect2 is immutable. Once these objects are created they can never be changed so multiple references to the same object will never cause problems. However, it does mean that for most vector operations new objects are created. Methods that start with a capital letter create a new object, just as a reminder of this behavior.

      • angle

        public double angle()
        Angle.
        Returns:
        the angle of this vector in the range (-pi, pi]. Convention is counter-clockwise with respect to east.

      • trk

        public double trk()
        Track angle.
        Returns:
        the track angle of this vector in the range (-pi, pi]. The track angle is the clockwise angle with respect to north, i.e., v.track() = pi/2 - v.angle().

      • compassAngle

        public double compassAngle()
        Compass angle.
        Returns:
        the track angle of this vector in the range [0, 2*pi). Convention is clockwise with respect to north.

      • compassAngle

        public double compassAngle​(Vect2 v2)
        Compass angle from this position to v2
        Parameters:
        v2 - vector
        Returns:
        the track angle of v2-this vector in the range [0, 2*Math.PI). Convention is clockwise with respect to north.

      • mkTrkGs

        public static Vect2 mkTrkGs​(double trk,
                            double gs)
        Construct a Vect2 from a track angle and ground speed. This is a vector of length gs pointed in the direction of track angle of trk.
        Parameters:
        trk - track angle
        gs - ground speed
        Returns:
        a vector in with the given length and with the direction of track angle

      • mkLengthAngle

        public static Vect2 mkLengthAngle​(double length,
                                  double angle)
        Construct a Vect2 from the math angle and length.
        Parameters:
        length - length of the vector
        angle - a mathematical angle (0 degrees is to the right, angles increase counter-clockwise)
        Returns:
        a vector in with the given length and with the direction of "angle"

      • right_or_left

        public static int right_or_left​(Vect2 vo,
                                Vect2 vop)
        Determine if vop is to the right or to the left of vo. Returns 1 if vop is to the right, -1 if vop is to the left.
        Parameters:
        vo - first vector
        vop - second vector
        Returns:
        1 if vop is to the right, -1 if vop is to the left

      • intersect_pt

        public static Vect2 intersect_pt​(Vect2 s0,
                                 Vect2 v0,
                                 Vect2 s1,
                                 Vect2 v1)
        Computes intersection point of two lines
        Parameters:
        s0 - starting point of line 1
        v0 - direction vector for line 1
        s1 - starting point of line 2
        v1 - direction vector of line 2
        Returns:
        2-dimensional point of intersection, or an invalid point if they are parallel
